title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Explore the fundamentals of computer science in this introductory course.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Learn about data structures and algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Database Management Systems
description: Gain expertise in managing databases effectively for various applications.

title: Computer Networking Essentials
description: Understand the principles of computer networking and how data is transmitted over networks.

title: Software Engineering Principles
description: Learn about software development methodologies and best practices.

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: Explore the fundamentals of cybersecurity and how to protect systems from cyber threats.

title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
description: Discover the basics of artificial intelligence and its applications.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Learn to develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
